Eventual case studies using `msktr` in different settings:

- [ ] [Continuous data](#): Modelling biomass with the zero-augmented Gamma distribution.
- [ ] [Proportional data](#): Modelling % cover with the tail-adjusted Beta distribution.
- [ ] [Multiple gradients](#): Building a picture of the empirical realised niche with multiple environmental gradients.
- [ ] [Multiple species](#): Comparing community responses to an environmental gradient.
